articles.author: Edward Thicknesse
articles.title: UK airlines lagging behind European rivals as travel restrictions continue - City A.M.
articles.description: The UK's airlines have been the slowest in Europe to recover from the coronavirus pandemic, new figures released tonight show, as travel restrictions continue to hammer the sector.
